website_summaries.verdict: An ergonomic little vacuum by a popular brand that comes with several nice features as well as some potentially frustrating flaws.
pros: Boasts a lightweight design with a unique shape that fits easily in tight spaces
Rechargeable, and has a USB charging cable
2-in-1 crevice tool can fit in small areas in your car
cons: Fan is in an awkward down-facing position and tends to scatter debris while you clean

customer_reviews.title: Critically Flawed
customer_reviews.text: I gave this one a chance (along with a Shark W1) due to the great price, but as the other reviews have pointed out, it is critically flawed. The exhaust blows downward, instead of out of the sides, so all of the dust and pet hair goes flying into the air. The suction diminishes along with the battery. This is going back and I am sticking with the Shark W1. The Shark is twice the price, but does everything I hoped this would. The Eufy provides the performance of a $25 dust buster at twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Majeski

customer_reviews.title: edited review, vaccum is so so, but customer service is really good.
customer_reviews.text: After Eufy reached out to me and showed their great customer service, I had to change the review. The vacuum it's self is so so, but the main reason I increased my rating from 2stars to 4 stars is because their customer service is great.
customer_reviews.author: Med

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, portable design, quick and convenient charging
customer_reviews.text: used this product for a few times, and so far it is great. It's very easy to clean up little crumbs and tiny messes. After cleaning, it is convenient to empty and clean. Also, I love its small and lightweight design so that I can take it anywhere easily. Because of its size, there's never a problem to store it. For charging, it can charge via USB and charge fast. I do like how firm the bristles are and how it can scrub and lift dirt well in small spaces. I love how long and narrow the attachment is, and it can get into those hard to reach areas. Overall, it is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: yifei

customer_reviews.title: The wonders of Eufy
customer_reviews.text: Surprised and happy. Most tiny vacs don't do much but do make noise. This little vac was used on a carpet covered cat tree....removed dust, cat nails and probably dander. Very impressive for such a small vacuum. Great for those tiny places other hand vacs can't go. Thanks Eufy! A company that is giving Shark, Dyson and others a run for the customers money.
customer_reviews.author: C-ya

customer_reviews.title: Good vac. Great service!
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum works really well. Not too noisy. We had issue with 1st unit motor going out in couple weeks. Eufy was more then accommodating and shipped a new one in 24 hours. Super great service. Why we own 6 eufy products. Very legit customer service! We have 2 other vacuums and both work great 2/3 years. Hopefully was a one-off situation and will update if 2nd ones has issue.
customer_reviews.author: DWood32006

customer_reviews.title: Good for quick cleanups on hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and compact. Battery life is decent. Doesn't have a whole lot of suction but is very handy for quick cleanups from hard and smooth surfaces like a tile or wood floor or crumbs from the kitchen table. It is reasonably easy to clean the filter although sometimes it is a little tricky to click the filter in just right after cleaning. All in all, a good purchase and I use it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: LOVE EUFY AND ANKER PRODUCTS BUT I WOULD AVOID THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE ALL MY EUFY AND ANKER PRODUCTS I CURRENTLY OWN ESPECIALLY MY ROBOVAC BUT I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND BUYING THIS VACUUM. IT'S VERY ECSTATICALLY PLEASING BUT WHEN I WENT TO USE IT IN THE CORNERS OF MY BATHROOM THIS WEEKEND I NOTICED IT WAS NOT PICKING UP ANYTHING AT ALL, JUST BLOWING IT AROUND. I TOOK IT APART AND CLEANED EVERYTHING OUT VERY WELL AND WENT BACK TO TRY AGAIN, STILL NOTHING. I PUT MY HAND BY THE NOZZLE AND REALIZED THE EXHAUST VENT FACED DOWN AND WAS BLOWING HAIR AND DUST EVERYWHERE. I HOPE THEY FIX THIS FLAW AND COME OUT WITH A NEW MODEL SOON.
customer_reviews.author: Seth D.

customer_reviews.title: Is it a blower or a vacuum?
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the exhaust exits onto the surface you are trying to vacuum. My daughter and I were trying to vacuum some saw dust and the exhaust vent blew the sawdust everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: lightls

customer_reviews.title: Maybe don't make the exhaust as powerful as to negate suction
customer_reviews.text: So the air that blows out of the vacuum is more powerful than the suction, when trying to suck some dirt or debris, it gets blown away from the intake before you can suck it up, making the vacuum USELESS. Also, it uses micro b to charge it, in this day and age? USB C is just as expensive, but now the norm. Pass.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for small areas
customer_reviews.text: Works great for small areas and particles. Primarily using this to clean up around a litter box and it's perfect for about that much. Battery life is pretty short, but you shouldn't be relying heavily on this anyway. Suction is pretty low so don't expect it to get pet hair off of furniture or clothes very well. For what I'm using it for, I've been happy with it. Very portable as well. About the size of a wine bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light Weight Rechargeable Cordless Hand Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Like this little vacuum. Bought for small jobs like vacuuming crumbs off bed so don’t need extra strong suction. Works great. Fairly quiet. Not like noisy DustBuster. Just stops when needs charging so initially you might think it’s jammed. Charges quickly. No issues. Very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: WendyF

customer_reviews.title: Small capacity and limited battery but very portable
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I see is the vents being on the bottom which tends to push lighter dust/hair out of the way, but if you hold it upside down and reposition the cone so that the opening faces the opposite direction it works much better. This isn’t a replacement for a standard cordless vacuum for cleaning stairs (my 8 year old tried this) but great for little messes. I plan on eventually getting more of them so we can keep one in each car, the living room, kitchen and home office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw but easy to fix
customer_reviews.text: I like almost everything about this vacuum, the only issue we had was with the placement of the vent blowing air out of the back. It blows all the crumbs(etc) around while you’re trying to to vacuum them. We easily fixed it by taping over the vent to redirect the air backwards. Hope that makes sense. Other than that, it’s a nice, compact/portable vacuum that works well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jakamazon

customer_reviews.title: Modern, lightweight handheld vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum due to m previous good experience with Eufy robo vacuum. This little cute vacuum is the most elegant portable vacuum for my kitchen. Modern look, lightweight, and simple. I agree with other reviewers that it blows away dirts if its in a certain angel. That’s why I give it 4 stars. The suction is not amazing but good enough for the purpose I have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: VelvetDream

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for quick touch ups
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little vac for my 3 row SUV. It's pretty handy and compact, but could definitely be slightly more powerful...for the most part it gets the job done. It charges pretty quickly and holds a charge long enough for me to vacuum my entire vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie C.

customer_reviews.title: Counter Top
customer_reviews.text: Fit neatly on the kitchen counter top. Very handy for small pick ups
customer_reviews.author: Carole Salemi

customer_reviews.title: Nice for craft room, office, etc.
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightweight, works well, holds a charge a good while. The thing I don’t like is that it rolls when you lay it down. I had to put rubber bands around it to keep it from always rolling off the table.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum at the right price point
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this little vac for about a month. I stash it in my master bathroom for quick clean ups. So far it’s been great. For what I use it for (dust, hair, etc) the suction power has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ku

customer_reviews.title: Works well for short tasks.
customer_reviews.text: A few drawbacks: The battery does not last long, maybe 15 minutes. It is also pretty loud, but that's not a showstopper. The positive: The crevice/brush tool is great for small corners and for picking up pet hair. Worked wonders for my living room furniture!
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: love this.. easy to handle.. works great in vehicle, cleaning couch and much more.. bought parents one and they love as well.. great suction and excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie W.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Has barely any suction power and the battery goes out quickly. No wonder it's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Charge and Use
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this a couple of times but find it very lightweight, fast charging and effective.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Had it for few months now but hardly use it. It blows air downwards so unless you angle it perfect it just blows stuff around.
customer_reviews.author: Gray mgl

customer_reviews.title: A gem!
customer_reviews.text: There is NOTHING I don’t like about this little hand vac! It is lightweight, has great suction, is simple to use, and is a great value. The washable dust filter is a huge plus. And I like the Eufy Robo Vac I purchased along with it just as much. Best finds in household cleaning items I’ve found in a long, long time. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gooood
customer_reviews.text: Good quality as eufy known for and powerful cleaner for small areas
customer_reviews.author: Walaa ali

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for a great price. My husband bought it for his car and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: I luv red

customer_reviews.title: Works well in many areas:home, car, boat etc
customer_reviews.text: It’s sleek, efficient and effective! Arrived quickly and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Wilton

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We had a slight problem with the light going on and off. It appeared to be a short. I contacted the company and got a replacement. Super great follow up from them. Wonderful customer service. Would totally recommend them. More businesses should be like this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Castellano

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful suction and very easy and friendly to use but it will be much better if you add type-c for charging and bag to carry the vacuum and the tools for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali A.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This has very little suction and barely picks up a bug from window sill . I bought to use in camper and my window sills but not worth it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its decent
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little more powerful but overall not bad
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sabatino

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size and shape. I wish it had a longer battery life and a bit more power.
customer_reviews.author: Candice J. Benteu

customer_reviews.title: Covenient design with usb charging
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to keep in car and very easy to operate. Even can put in cup holder in the third row seat.
customer_reviews.author: Le Truong Thien

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Missed almost all dust. Suction power too low. Not worth even a dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect couples with my Eufy Robo vac.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing. Takes up very little space. Cleans well. Is pretty quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Kota

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: I find it is dependable. It does grab ANY cord. My previous one could go over some cords. It seems to clean well.
customer_reviews.author: Jan wyn

customer_reviews.title: Sleek compact vacuum with great suction
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Perfect for the kitchen, desk, car. We might need one on each floor of the house
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Arora

customer_reviews.title: The vent expelling air blows directly on where you are trying to clean
customer_reviews.text: This vac is a failure in design. The vent that expels air blows directly down into the path of where you are cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: If you have little kids... this is a must have!! Cleans those crumbs like a champ!! Love mine!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Suction is great
customer_reviews.text: Great little vac, use it almost every day along with Eufy robovac
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Love this handheld product. It makes doing baseboards, blinds, etc. a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Terry

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I am able to use it to vacuum my porcelain dolls.
customer_reviews.author: albina T. Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Silly design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I like the vacuum but most likely will return , it does have a design flaw, the exhaust air shoots downwards........so if you can imagine holding the vacuum at angle and vacuuming up “stuff” the exhaust blows that “stuff” around.. It does the job for small stuff as expected but you lose a huge amount of suction when you use the supplied attachments I wanted to like it but it needs refinement
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Reviews Are Mixed - Read Here
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this knowing two things. 1. People had issues with the exhaust placement & 2. Eufy products are generally great and have awesome customer service. With that being said the exhaust placement can be an issue... IF you don't use the cleanup attachment. I liked the style and size of this vacuum, the washable filter, and the price point. If you use the vacuum without the attachment you might find some issues on hard surfaces (no issue on carpet or fabric for me). For $50 the customer service is worth it to me because I know if I have an issue Eufy will take care of it. use the attachment - vacuum rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty vaccum and useful
customer_reviews.text: The design is lovely and it is very useful for small pickups in tight spaces. The exhaust is in the wrong position for some issues as it blows where you want to pick up junk. You must hold it vertically. The trash cup does not sit tight enough in the tube to protect the motor from dirt. But, the customer service is terrific and very responsive. They sent me extra trash cups so that I could replace them more often to protect the motor. I have several other Anker/Eufy products and they are all very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Coolsgirl

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!  You need to clean up your kid's crumbs?
customer_reviews.text: I will say from the get go, we bought this on sale, not at full price. But this thing is awesome!!! How many times does your kid eat chips, crackers, etc on the couch with the crumbs everywhere? Well, quickly this picks everything up without having to breakout the vacuum cleaner! So easy and powerful! I would have paid more than the sale price knowing this works this well! It is sooooo handy!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Winow

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: Update: the on off button was placed worse place possible. Every time I use it I accidently touch button shutting it off no less than 2x. It should have been placed on back side or have cover over front to prevent this from happening. Initial post: Does well for hand helds. Wish it had larger trash bin and add holder for the attachment. I like that the cover allows it stand upright.!
customer_reviews.author: C. J

customer_reviews.title: The design is flawed.
customer_reviews.text: The suction power is not bad. But if there are too many foreign bodies in the filter element, the suction power will be greatly reduced. The battery life is very ordinary, it is estimated that it can only last more than ten minutes. The design of the filter element is defective. Because there is no sealant, foreign matter can easily enter the motor. It is not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NO.....

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Battery Life (Not Too Good For Price)
customer_reviews.text: The battery life only lasted 13 minutes after it was charged for 2.5-3 hours. It should last longer than 13 minutes after it's been charged for that long. It's also too pricey for something that only lasts 13 minutes. The suction is great and it's easy to clean but, the battery life is what I didn't like. I tried cleaning my car with it, and it didn't last very long. Was very disappointed. Had to return the product for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: SammBB

customer_reviews.title: Eufy surely is stealing the spotlight!
customer_reviews.text: A great product for the value. Eufy is definitely one of those "more bang for your buck" styles. The battery life is short, but so is the charge time. My major complaint would be the storage amount for debris picked up. It barely handle a few pieces of popcorn. However, it is very strong and great for small crumbs and reaches hard to get areas. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steven McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Depends on purpose
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help my sister clean the car and that works great ,some time use for clean small place of the couch(pet hair ) is also ok aswell. btw dont think that can be replace your main vacuum cleaner,but this product do give u some Convenient when u just need to clean some place and dont want to use a heavy vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great unit and also great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to find many uses for this unit. In addition to picking up messes on the floor... counter tops, desk tops, under cabinets, IN cabinets! It was in constant use until I decided to clean it out one day near the kitchen sink. After finishing I could not find the dust cup... Until turning on the garbage disposal! Found it! Needless to say I needed help and eufy customer service came to my rescue! Very good unit... Very good customer service! Thank you eufy!
customer_reviews.author: Beth B

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful for the size
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the bomb. It has solid sucking power and is steady for the duration of use until low battery. The only downside is the power button is right where you want to place your thumb while in use so I turn it off sometimes by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want to chase your mess around
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum until you try to cleanup a mess and it blows the dirt everywhere. I fan on the motor needs to be reversed to make it worthwhile. I don’t need a dust storm when I try to vacuum. Hope they fix it bc eufy has a great reputation but they missed the mark on this one
customer_reviews.author: Brelic

customer_reviews.title: Damn I love Anker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! Handy, stylish, easy to use, my only complaint it's not USB-C, I mean come on it's 2020! If that's not an issue for you then go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Dmytro

customer_reviews.title: Actually a great little vac
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to suck up a little soul off some leaves and it even sucked up some of the smaller rocks. A bit alarming when it happened, but holy crap..this thing rocks! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wisch

customer_reviews.title: love the size
customer_reviews.text: It is a great little vacuum, the small filter space is not great. You need to clean it out often, but other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Compact and great for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: The small size and USB charging makes this an easy choice for quick clean up jobs. Charges fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Cheong

customer_reviews.title: Is it brand new?
customer_reviews.text: The box look like opened or not brand new. I just ordered Eufy smart lock the same situation, opened or look not brand new.
customer_reviews.author: apology guy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the small size fool you!
customer_reviews.text: Great device and easy to use. Very powerful too. Works great for small jobs and using on the autos.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase one.
customer_reviews.text: It’s horriible, it isn’t even a good toy vacuum for children.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Carey

customer_reviews.title: I can take it throughout the house with no plug in needed
customer_reviews.text: It is a little bit heaver than I thought it would be but I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great for cleaning up crumbs on the table or small spills.
customer_reviews.author: dscp

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it too
customer_reviews.text: Great way to quickly and easily pick up small messes. My 2 year old loves cleaning with it.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Nice little
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum. Best part is that it stands in its own. Fairly easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: As advertised . Nice compact hand held vac.
customer_reviews.text: Great little handheld vac and easy to clean out basket and filter. Battery life before needing recharging is under 20 minutes so keep the charging cord handy.
customer_reviews.author: Johnboy

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly fine for small stuff but not good for heavy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Rajput

product_meta.title: eufy by Anker, HomeVac H11, Cordless Handheld Vacuum Cleaner, Ultra-Lightweight 1.2lbs, 5500Pa Suction Power, USB Charging, for Home Cleaning
feature_bullets: Lightweight and Compact: Completely cordless, weighing just 1.2lbs, and being roughly the size of a wine bottle. Cleaning is made effortless and storage is made simple.
Dust Devouring Suction: With 5500Pa of power, you can suck up every spec in seconds when everyday mess is made.
Every Nook and Cranny Covered: Use the 2-in-1 crevice tool to reach into the deepest corners of your sofa or under low-lying furniture.
Micro USB Connectivity for Convenient Charging: Simply use a USB charger anywhere in your home and charge with ease.
What’s in the box: eufy HomeVac H11, 2-in-1 Crevice Tool,USB to Micro-USB cable and our worry-free 24-month warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars231 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
